items.content_html:
This PR updates and corrects version values for Chromium (Chrome, Opera, Samsung Internet, WebView Android) for the sideways member of the text-orientation CSS property. The data comes from the mdn-bcd-collector project (v9.4.0).

Check out the collector's guide on how to review this PR.

Tests Used: https://mdn-bcd-collector.gooborg.com/tests/css/properties/text-orientation/sideways
items.title: Update Chromium data for css.properties.text-orientation.sideways

items.content_html: This PR updates and corrects version values for Microsoft Edge for the text-justify CSS property. This mirrors the data from Chrome.
items.title: Update Edge data for text-justify CSS property

items.content_html:
Summary

Update to note that support for session.storage was provided in Firefox 115. See Bug 1823713 Implement storage.session in extension process.
items.title: Details of support for sessions.storage

items.content_html:
Reverts #19614. The mdn-bcd-collector project says that these features are not supported. Looking at the ChromeStatus entry, I don't see any milestones marked, and the linked bug is Open.

(Also, FYI @chrisdavidmills, the version_removed of the flag data should have been 113, not 112, unless the feature was completely unavailable in Chrome 112 -- however, that flag data would have also qualified as an irrelevant flag and could be removed entirely!)
items.title: Revert "Update Storage Access API data"
